name: Truth or Dare
description: Truth or Dare? is a party game requiring two or more players. Players are given the choice between answering a question truthfully, or performing a 'dare', both of which are set by the other players.
basicRules: One player asks another player, 'Truth or Dare?'
If the player chooses 'truth', they must answer a question truthfully.
If the player chooses 'dare', they must perform a task.
After answering the question or performing the dare, that player asks another player 'Truth or Dare?'.
The game continues for as long as the players want.
tips: Know your limits and don't feel pressured to do anything you are not comfortable with.
Be creative with your truths and dares.
The point of the game is to have fun, so keep it light-hearted.
